attributes.action: help older people stop being abused in their own homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lots of older people get abused in their homes , weather it be by family eg; physical, verbal or mental. people coming to the door pretending to be eg "checking the metre/boiler" (what ever it may be).Even the goverment doesn't do enough to stop this from happing.
